title: Ticket #364: Package Windows distribution packages in NMI
description: We've long wanted the Windows build returned from NMI to also build the distribution packages. This ticket is to keep track of this effort.
remarks:
2010-Aug-23 17:07:50 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070402 to v070404 using ./ticket_target_mover.
2010-Oct-27 16:39:01 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070404 to v070405 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2013-May-28 15:20:07 by tannenba:
Windows packages are nowadays built as part of NMI, using WiX called out from cmake/cpack. Abandoning.
check_ins: 2009-Jul-12 14:39   Check-in [15059]: Ticket #364: Added the environment variables Z found to be missing in his investigation of MakeMSI as a Condor job. (By Ben Burnett )
creator: burnett
